name: GENERATIONS (Serious Table)
description:
Play GENERATIONS, a GoGodotJam 3 game with the theme of EVOLUTION!

Pilot your ship with auto-firing weapons and destroy your enemies with three different damage types! But be warned; every enemy killed causes the enemy to EVOLVE, growing more resistant to that type of damage! Vary your strategy and HURL your weapon at the enemies to shake some of that resistance loose!

How long can you last?!

WASD to move! Move over weapons to pick them up! THEY FIRE FOR YOU!

Press SPACE to THROW YOUR WEAPON and destroy anything in your path!

Every enemy you hit with a thrown weapon REDUCES enemy resistances!

All assets used are used with permission by their authors.

Art, Font, Music - Kenney, CC0 (Kenney.nl)
Sound - GameSupplyGuy, CC BY-SA 4.0 (GameSupplyGuy on Itch.io)
